overview: Brian Peterson is one of the founding members of Firespotter. He currently serves as a software engineer, specializing in web and Android development. Previously he was a Senior Software Engineer at Google for eight years. During his time there, he was the first Google engineer transfer to the acquired Google Voice/Grand Central team. Prior to his transfer, Brian was one of two original members of the Online Sales and Operations Google engineering team. Brian has a BS degree in Computer Science from the University of California, San Diego. A native Californian, Brian currently resides in San Jose, California. In his free time, Brian enjoys developing independent websites.
